text: Escape to Burma is a 1955 American adventure drama movie directed by Allan Dwan was based on the short story Bow Tamely to Me by Kenneth Perkins. It stars Barbara Stanwyck, Robert Ryan, David Farrar, Robert Warwick, Murvyn Vye and Robert Cabal. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 adventure movies Category:1955 drama movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies set in Myanmar Category:Movies directed by Allan Dwan
title: Escape to Burma
